recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrots)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a large pan.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and garlic, stir well.

recipes.title: Schnitzel
instructions: Season cutlets with salt and pepper.
Coat each cutlet in flour, dip in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Fry schnitzels until golden brown on both sides.
Drain on paper towels and serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and feta.
Whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to coat.
